00035         public Activator() {
00036         }

00038         /*
00039          * (non-Javadoc)
00040          * @see org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin#start(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext)
00041          */
00042         public void start(BundleContext context) throws Exception {
00043                 super.start(context);
00044                 plugin = this;
00045                 symbolicName = this.getBundle().getSymbolicName();
00046                 log = plugin.getLog();
00047                 log("Plugin started", Status.OK);
00048         }
00049 
00050         /*
00051          * (non-Javadoc)
00052          * @see org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin#stop(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext)
00053          */
00054         public void stop(BundleContext context) throws Exception {
00055                 plugin = null;
00056                 log = null;
00057                 super.stop(context);
00058         }

00066                 return plugin;

00076         public static ImageDescriptor getImageDescriptor(String path) {
00077                 return imageDescriptorFromPlugin(PLUGIN_ID, path);

00081                 log.log(new Status(status, symbolicName, message) );

00088         public URI locateFile(String path) throws IOException {
00089                 Path aPath = new Path( path ); 
00090                 URL urlWithBundleProtocol       = FileLocator.find(this.getBundle(), aPath, Collections.EMPTY_MAP);
00091                 if ( urlWithBundleProtocol == null ) {
00092                         throw new FileNotFoundException( path );
00093                 }
00094                 URL urlWithFileProtocol         = FileLocator.toFileURL( urlWithBundleProtocol );
00095                 String fileURLAsString          = urlWithFileProtocol.getFile();
00096                 URI result = URI.createFileURI( fileURLAsString );
00097                 return result;
00098         }
00099 
00100         public URI locateFile(URI fileURI) throws IOException {
00101                 return locateFile( fileURI.toFileString() );            
00102         }
